comment: I needed an app that replicated Motos actions when changing phone brand and this does exactly what I need it to. Not much more to be said, not the prettiest app but you shouldn't have to go in it really!  *Edit* recent update has broken the app and when the screen goes off from the lock screen so does the light, please fix! *

author: Cindy Tanner
comment: Great app! But, since the most recent update my flashlight only stays on for a few seconds before shutting off. Can't figure out how to fix it. Galaxy Note 8

reply.author: ID Mobile SA
reply.content: This issue has been resolved with the last release.

author: Ben Hughes
comment: I have had this app for a very long time and I am very proud if it because of how often I actually find myself using it. However in a recent update the app no longer persists when the lock screen turns off and it shuts off the light. When I changed the automatic turnoff to ten minutes nothing changed rendering this app only annoying now. I really appreciate the simplistic design of the app and it is way more responsive than any other shake light but this one issue really makes me want to not use this. I only get like 10 seconds of light at a time now. If I could either find a way to make my lock screen stay open longer or make the app light persist after the screen turns off then I would have no issue anymore.

author: Dan Gall
comment: Been using this app on my pixel v1 since the minute I took it out of the box. Works great everytime

author: Dave Smith
comment: Used to work great. Now the lock screen shuts down after a few seconds and the light shuts off.

reply.author: ID Mobile SA
reply.content: This issue has been resolved with the last release.

author: Dustin Falter
comment: Doesn't work on S8+ at all

reply.author: ID Mobile SA
reply.content: Please contact the support from within the app. We don't have any general problem with the s8.

author: L Williams
comment: Pros: Easiest flashlight to turn on, most of the time my phone goes from pocket to hand and with a flick of the wrist I have a tiny phone sized but bright light, anywhere needed.  Cons: Occasionally app needs to be switched back on because it will not work with a shake.... Still very easy app to use been using it for years, most used app on my phone. Thanks

author: Jacob Baird
comment: If you've ever owned a Motorola device this application is an absolute necessity. This is the best application I've found that replicates the chop twice for flash light feature that Moto phones have. It takes a second longer, but it works flawlessly.

author: Peter Krisko
comment: Why can't this just be a single button? You have 3 different buttons on the app you can configure with no explanation for any of them and when I turn it on and unlock my phone it keeps turning off. You complicated what should've been the simplest possible app you could download.

author: Cupid Stunt
comment: Retarded. You have to have the app open for it to work. Don't waste your time.

author: A Google User
comment: Has a shake option. the app is a little shaky. Older models were better so the app made options.

author: Ben Chan
comment: Ads are full screen videos (15 seconds or more) with audio and display upon gesture before the flash light turns on. App is useless when you need to turn on flashlight.

I give it 2 stars cause when it works it does so very well. However, despite an option in the app's settings to check for a running background service the app gets killed by Android system after a while. Whenever I needed it it wasn't working. I excluded it from battery saver and used the shortest check interval - all to no avail. I might as well unlock the phone and use the native flashlight. Deleted.

author: Keith Carson
comment: Didn't work on the lock screen on my HTC One M8. Actually couldn't get it to work anywhere except for the shake sensitivity setting screen. The last straw was an automatic video ad that played when I opened the settings.

author: Kathy Beko
comment: Oh my love this flashlight, best thing is it does what it says. Works great on lock screen. No more worries about finding a light! Thank you bunches.

author: Star Hopes
comment: Not set up great and didn't work on lock screen but shake part is ok.

author: Joseph Dawson
comment: For Nexus 6P users with 7.0 and higher, there is an extra setting IN the settings to fix the "not working with Nougat" issue. The app works great. Thanks developer!!

author: Mohammad Ahmos
comment: Easy to use , very high and accurate sensitivity ... But needs to add an option to start flash by shaking without need to open on the screen
I've been using this app for about 2 years and have not had any issues with it. It works as advertised. Brightest flashlight that I've found. Use it almost everyday and absolutely love it.

author: Austin pinto
comment: DON'T USE THIS APP AT ALL because this says that it opens only in lock screen but when i tried noting happened this is all bullshit.

reply.author: ID Mobile SA
reply.content: This can't be through since we have a half a million happy users but you are welcome to contact our support directly within the app. Normally it's just a question of settings.

author: Rafa Murillo
comment: Worked great for a day on my Pixel 2 XL now won't turn on with the shake function. Does not work.

author: De Luth
comment: Shake feature does not work if you are using face recognition. Other than that it actually works quite well. Would be 5 stars if it wasn't for this problem.

author: Robert Ghrist
comment: Does not work as advertised. Lots of ads.

author: Luke S
comment: Just learned of how to make the app persistent which makes it invaluable and very convenient.  Good work!

author: Anisha Gartia
comment: Doesn't work at all on Nexus 5X

author: Rebecca Lopez
comment: Light doesn't come on when device is shook on the lock screen even after I did the repair test for the app

author: Paul Seabrook
comment: doesn't work on pixel XL

reply.author: ID Mobile SA
reply.content: Did you try the help function in the app? You can also write to the support.

author: Eliose Prior
comment: It didn't even work

author: Amicus Curiae
comment: Only works if app is already on. I just want to shake my phone without having to open an app

author: Urban Kitsune
comment: Moto e4 doesn't have he gesture but thankfully this app makes it work just as well :)
A flashlight app should not need to record audio or video!!! Uninstal asap

author: B. Leo
comment: Even at its least sensitive setting, the shake feature was far too sensitive with my Samsung S7

author: M Felkins
comment: Turns when I don't want it to and doesn't turn on when I need it

author: Robert Turculeț
comment: Why does it need the permision for recording video?

author: Carlos Abascal
comment: Not quite there yet

author: Jamey Hunnicutt
comment: Works well for me

author: Ivan Petrovici
comment: Perfecr application,  perfect lock screen shake option

author: Karen Breeze
comment: Way brighter than my last phones flashlight

author: Maribel Velez - Iglesias
comment: Best app. I have for a flashlight
I like it
